name: In a Bind
description:
In a bind is a physics puzzle game with some minor platforming elements based around the fun idea of using ropes to find creative solutions.

You traverse levels as an R.M.R unit which stands for rope making robot but we like to call it Roamer.

While playing as Roamer you have to use a finite supply of rope to try and overcome many different obstacles from high cliffs to rolling boulders.
